comment.author: 35239250@N07
comment._content: I liked this picture because she has this aura of importance in it. She seemed like she was a "somebody". After searching her name I found out that she was a member of the Colony Club, an organization that was comprised of some of New York's brightest women.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: They are in front of the Newport Casino, in the resort city of Newport, Rhode Island -- shown here in another Bain/LOC photo: www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4036734355/ [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4036734355/]
